attributes.long-description:
From acclaimed director, Hideo Kojima, Metal Gear Solid HD Collection for the PlayStation®Vita handheld entertainment system includes two legendary MGS titles - Metal Gear Solid 2: Sons of Liberty and Metal Gear Solid 3: Snake Eater. The HD Collection provides the epic gameplay of the MGS franchise with all-new features including intuitive PS Vita system controls and game-save/trophy sharing with the PlayStation®3 computer entertainment system.

KEY GAME FEATURES:

• Over 30 hours of gameplay – Includes MGS2, VR Missions, MGS3, MG, and MG2

• Optimized Touch Controls - Zoom in on captivating cut-scenes, peek around corners, interrogate enemies, cycle through weapons/items, perform quick attacks with your knife and more.

• Transfarring - Continue your saved game no matter where you are by transferring your trophies and save-game data back and forth from your PlayStation®3 system and the PlayStation®Vita system

1 player(s)
932KB Minimum
